entry.title: How About Restoring the Holy Roman Empire?

link.title: How About Restoring the Holy Roman Empire?

entry.content:
Post 189056 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Upon further examination, this is feeling less like "enjoy a fun eccentric history nerd from the old internet" and more like ... what it expressly says, a wish for a violent overthrow of democracy with bonus side helping of white nationalism and colonialism was good... and that's not feeling like something we need to be throwing eyes to. -- LobsterMitten
entry.summary: Post 189056 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Upon further examination, this is feeling less like "enjoy a fun eccentric history nerd from the old internet" and more like ... what it expressly says, a wish for a violent overthrow of democracy with bonus side helping of white nationalism and colonialism was good... and that's not feeling like something we need to be throwing eyes to. -- LobsterMitten
